landing_text: $(playername), Welcome to Create Conquest Arcane! This book should help you get started playing this pack.  Have Fun!$(br2)BTW: Conquest Reforged will not be ported to 1.19.2, therefore, neither will this pack. Hopefully Conquest Reforged will be ported to 1.20.
